metadata.name: Timothy Williams

persona.name: Robert King
persona.role: Existing customer, franchise gym owner (2 locations)
persona.goal: Renew/renegotiate service terms and schedule a callback with sales
persona.context: Current contract nearing renewal; wants to avoid price increases; can approve purchase but wants options laid out

intent.name: Renewal / Contract Review Callback
intent.description: An existing customer wants to renew or review their plan, which should be routed to a scheduled sales callback.
intent.goal: Confirm renewal intent, capture details, and schedule a callback appointment.
intent.initialMessage: Our contract is up soon—can someone call me to go over renewal options?

emotion.name: Frustrated
emotion.description: Mentions prior failed attempts or recurring issues; may use all caps or exclamation points; wants acknowledgment and fast resolution.

metadata.outcome: Callback scheduled for tomorrow at 10:30 AM Eastern with contact number provided.

turns.content: Our contract is up soon—can someone call me to go over renewal options?
I can have a Business Class agent call you about renewal options. May I have your first and last name and confirm this is for a business account?

messages: I can have a Business Class agent call you about renewal options. May I have your first and last name and confirm this is for a business account?

turns.content: Yeah, it’s a business account. Name’s Robert King, and I own a franchise gym with two locations.
Thanks, Robert. To set up a call, what date, time and timezone work best for you?

messages: Thanks, Robert. To set up a call, what date, time and timezone work best for you?

turns.content: Sooner the better—I’ve already tried calling twice this week. Can we do tomorrow at 10:30 AM Eastern? If that’s not available, suggest the closest time after that.
Great, I’ve penciled in tomorrow at 10:30 AM Eastern. To send you the reminder text, could you share the best phone number to reach you?

messages: Great, I’ve penciled in tomorrow at 10:30 AM Eastern. To send you the reminder text, could you share the best phone number to reach you?

turns.content: Use 512-753-8213—that’s my direct line. And please make sure they actually call this time; I can’t keep chasing this.
